q: How can flood barriers be integrated into modern architecture?
a: Design coordination early in the project allows recessing tracks into thresholds and color-matching façades. We work with architects to conceal hardware. See custom doorway panels.

q: Can barriers align with minimalist design?
a: Yes—flush-mount tracks and matte finishes maintain clean lines. Hidden fasteners create seamless transitions.

q: How do architects document floodproofing in drawings?
a: Include plan, elevation, and section with barrier height, track depth, and deployment notes. Reference ASCE 24 compliance.
